feed.title: Russian Journal of Numerical Analysis and Mathematical Modelling
feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in Russian Journal of Numerical Analysis and Mathematical Modelling

entry.title: Analysis of forced response and internal climate variability in the INMCM Earth system model
entry.summary: Article by Maria Buyanova, Andrei Gavrilov, Dmitry Mukhin DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/rnam-2025-0008

entry.title: Validation of the MGO regional climate model with a new parameterization of land surface processes
entry.summary: Article by Alexander V. Kozlov, Igor M. Shkolnik, Tatiana V. Pavlova DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/rnam-2025-0009

entry.title: An energy consistent summation-by-parts finite difference discretization for the non-hydrostatic atmospheric dynamics equations on the cubed-sphere grid
entry.summary: Article by Dmitry A. Markhanov, Vladimir V. Shashkin, Gordey S. Goyman DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/rnam-2025-0010

entry.title: Reproducibility of atmospheric circulation regimes over the winter Northern Hemisphere by the INMCM5 Earth system model
entry.summary: Article by Roman S. Samoilov, Dmitry N. Mukhin, Semen E. Safonov, Evgeny M. Loskutov, Anna Y. Mukhina, Andrey S. Gritsun DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/rnam-2025-0011

entry.title: Modelling magnetic field of a compact electro-magnetic device of experimental setup to study ROT effects in fission of heavy nuclei
entry.summary: Article by Marina B. Yuldasheva, Oleg I. Yuldashev, Vadim V. Novitsky DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/rnam-2025-0012
